summary: Changes the appearance of the rugs and windows in the mods "coffeshop"
descriptionHtml:
Includes textures to replace the imo not so fancy old rugs and windows for a fresh look. 

-changed craftable and placeable stormcloak rug 
-changed craftable and placeable skyrim rug
-changed craftable and placeable "psychedelic rug" to either a dark brother hodd themed or a "pazyryk" rug (oldest rug found irl)
-changed windows to look more realistic and not so heavy on the eye.

the textures come in a .rar file and as you have [url=http://https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8732/?tab=1&navtag=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D8732%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Cannabis skyrim[/url] installed you simply need to replace the textures.
directions are found within the .rar file. 

Programms->Steam->Steamapps->Common->Skyrim->Data->Textures->Cannabis-> (1.)Architecture (for the windows)  (2.)Clutter (for the rugs)

You obviously NEED cannabis skyrim installed to use the file. unless you want to use the textures for something else. You are free to do so as long as in no way or point in time you monetize them.

kind regards~
author: me
